question: Which country tops in the 2018 World Press Freedom Index a report released by Reporters Sans Frontieres (RSF)?
explanation: Norway topped in the 2018 World Press Freedom Index for second consecutive year followed by Sweden, Netherlands. India's 138th rank in the 2018 'World Press Freedom Index' marks a drop of two places as compared to 136th rank in 2017. The methodology to compile the index is based on qualitative inputs (responses of experts to a questionnaire) and quantitative inputs (data on abuses and acts of violence against journalists).
